entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
